required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: NOCDURNA PASS Study Using Registries in Denmark, Germany and Sweden
clinical_study.official_title: Post-authorisation Safety Study of NOCDURNA for the Symptomatic Treatment of Nocturia Due to Idiopathic Nocturnal Polyuria: A Multi-country Cohort Study Using Secondary Data

brief_summary.textblock: A study using medical records to evaluate safety issues for the NOCDURNA drug using national register data from Denmark and Sweden, and a health care register covering parts of Germany.

primary_outcome.description: Symptomatic hyponatraemia was defined as a primary or secondary diagnosis of hyponatraemia.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of hyponatraemia requiring hospital intensive care
secondary_outcome.description: Hyponatraemia requiring hospital intensive care was defined as a primary or secondary diagnosis of hyponatraemia recorded in an intensive care unit.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of clinically significant hyponatraemia
secondary_outcome.description: Clinically significant hyponatraemia was defined as a serum sodium concentration of <130 mmol/L. Severity of hyponatraemia was categorized as mild hyponatraemia (serum sodium concentration: 130 to <135 mmol/L), moderate hyponatraemia (serum sodium concentration: >125 to <130 mmol/L) and severe hyponatraemia (serum sodium concentration: less than equal to [â‰¤]125 mmol/L).
All-cause mortality was defined as death from any cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of major adverse cardiovascular events (MACE)
secondary_outcome.description: Major adverse cardiovascular events were defined as a record of myocardial infarction and stroke. Fatal and non-fatal events will be considered separately.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate of major venous thromboembolic events (VTEs)
secondary_outcome.description: Venous thromboembolic events were defined as a record of a deep vein thrombosis, pulmonary embolism or portal vein thrombosis. Fatal and non-fatal events will be considered separately.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence rate acute exacerbation of congestive heart failure
secondary_outcome.description: Acute exacerbation of congestive heart failure was defined as primary diagnosis of acute or acute-on-chronic heart failure from hospital inpatient care or the acute and emergency ward, or death from heart failure as the underlying or contributory cause.

secondary_outcome.measure: Incidence of serious adverse events of MACE and VTE in Sweden

study_pop.textblock: Patients with nocturia due to idiopathic nocturnal polyuria or treatment for LUTS.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Usage of NOCDURNA recorded as dispensations from drugstores in adults or or usage of drugs for LUTS.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Multiple dispensation of NOCDURNA on the same day or treatment with vasopressin 6 months before study start.

facility.name: German health care register, BIPS (there may be other sites)

condition_browse.mesh_term: Drug-Related Side Effects and Adverse Reactions

patient_data.ipd_description: Not possible due to GDPR and other laws.
